org.apache.shardingsphere.core.rewrite

类 SQLRewriteEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.shardingsphere.core.rewrite.SQLRewriteEngine

  • public final class SQLRewriteEngine
extends Object
    SQL rewrite engine.

    Rewrite logic SQL to actual SQL, should rewrite table name and optimize something.

    作者:
    zhangliang, maxiaoguang, panjuan

    • 构造器概要

        Constructs SQL rewrite engine.
        参数:
        shardingRule - databases and tables sharding rule
        originalSQL - original SQL
        databaseType - database type
        sqlRouteResult - SQL route result
        parameters - parameters
